characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a green car, person on a scooter
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. The white sedan ahead is maintaining a steady speed. A green car appears from the left lane and moves ahead of the white sedan. Towards the end of the segment, a person on a scooter suddenly appears from the right side, moving into the vehicles path.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while following the white sedan. As the green car overtakes from the left, the vehicle continues to drive straight. Towards the end, the vehicle slows down to avoid a potential collision with the person on the scooter who suddenly appears from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Left: A green car, approximately 5 meters away, overtaking the white sedan. 3) Right: A person on a scooter, approximately 3 meters away, suddenly moving into the vehicles path.
